Module graphicInterface

Package exception

package exception
  • Exception Classes
    Class
    Description
    BadBarrierEdgesException
    BadBarrierEdgesException is used when the two edges given to create a barrier are not adjacent
    BadDistanceException
    BadDistanceException is used when a checking method checks for a distance lesser than 1
    BadNumberPlayersException
    BadNumberPlayersException is used when the number of players isn't equal to 2 or 4.
    BadPositionException
    BadPositionException is used when the x or y attributes of a Position is an invalid value.
    BadSizeException
    BadSizeException is used when the size of the graph is an invalid value.
    BadTransparencyException
    BadTransparencyException is used when the transparency isn't between 0 and 100
    BadWeightException
    BadWeightException is used when the weight of an Edge is an invalid value.
    UnknownColorException
    UnknownColorException is used when a player has a color other than the 4 in the game (YELLOW, BLUE, RED, GREEN)
    UnknownDirectionException
    UnknownDirectionException is used when trying to use a direction other than NORTH, EAST, SOUTH, WEST
    UnknownPlayerIdException
    UnknownPlayerIdException is used when trying to use an id invalid input: '<' 0 or >= 4
